scripts.cy:open: TZ=Asia/Seoul npx cypress open --env allure=true --config specPattern=cypress/e2e/4_*.js --browser chrome
scripts.cy:run: TZ=Asia/Seoul DEBUG=allure-plugin* npx cypress run --config specPattern=cypress/e2e/4_*.js --env allure=true --browser chrome
scripts.cy:cucumber:open: TZ=Asia/Seoul npx cypress open --env allure=true --config specPattern=cypress/e2e/cucumber/*.feature,excludeSpecPattern=*.js --browser chrome
scripts.cy:cucumber:run: TZ=Asia/Seoul DEBUG=allure-plugin* npx cypress run --config specPattern=cypress/e2e/cucumber/*.feature,excludeSpecPattern=*.js --env allure=true --browser chrome
scripts.allure:history: mv -f allure-report/history allure-results/history && rm -r allure-report || true
